title: Chrome Flags for Android You Should Try !
description:
Updated list
https://techwiser.com/chrome-flags-for-android/

Simply copy paste the following links on your browser and enabled the chrome flags. 

1. New Way to Pick Photos
chrome://flags/#enable-new-photo-picker

2. Block Redirects to Protect Yourself
chrome://flags/#enable-framebusting-needs-sameorigin-or-usergesture

3. Change the style of your native video player
chrome://flags/#enable-modern-media-controls

4. Change Download Location
chrome://flags/#enable-downloads-location-change

5. Reader/Night Mode
chrome://flags/ #reader-mode-heuristics

Get Chrome Home Flag back
https://www.apkmirror.com/apk/google-inc/chrome/chrome-65-0-3325-109-release/
